title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, Saudi Arabia achieved 100% internet usage among both male and female populations, marking a significant milestone in digital connectivity.

title: Minimal Use of Combustible Renewables and Waste
description: As of 2022, only 0.003% of Saudi Arabia's total energy consumption came from combustible renewables and waste, indicating a reliance on other energy sources.

title: High Losses Due to Theft and Vandalism
description: In 2022, Saudi Arabian firms reported losses amounting to 61.9% of annual sales due to theft and vandalism, highlighting a significant challenge for businesses.

title: Limited Formal Training Opportunities for Firms
description: Only 3.9% of firms in Saudi Arabia offered formal training to their employees in 2022, indicating a potential area for workforce development.
